attributes.action: Give the Police back Powers to attend to Noise Disturbance
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
The Police should be given back the powers to attend to complaints such as unruly, noisy neighbours.

Too many people are allowed to annoy neighbours with their noise and rowdy parties which go on continuosly during the evening and into the next day.

The police are not allowed to intervene, give them back these powers, this is why we have so many problems, because the police have had powers withdrawn from them.

They can deal with unruly behaviour in the streets and pubs why can't it be the same for unruly neighbours.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
